import numpy as np 
import pandas as pd 
import seaborn as sns
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

%matplotlib inline
source.8137b7f0:
def plot_barh(y, x, title=None, xlabel=None, ylabel=None,figsize=(10,10),style='fivethirtyeight', color='blue', write_num=False):
    plt.style.use(style)
    fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=figsize)
    
    plt.barh(y, x, height=0.75, color=color)
    plt.title(title)
    plt.xlabel(xlabel)
    plt.ylabel(ylabel)
    if write_num:
        for i, v in enumerate(x):
            ax.text(v, i - .25, str(v),)
    plt.show()
source.f6dda11e: plot_barh(df['Country'],df['MedAge'], 'Median age of each country', 'Median Age', 'Country', figsize=(10,16) ,color='green', write_num=True)

billion = 1000000000
country_over_billion_population = df[['Country','Population']][df['Population'] > billion]
title='Countries with over billion population'
plot_barh(y=country_over_billion_population['Country'],x=country_over_billion_population['Population'],color='red', title=title, xlabel='Population', figsize=(5,4))
plt.show()
